name: Mothman's Macaroni
description:
help mothman find all 5 ingredients for his famous macaroni recipe :)

!!WARNINGS!!

the sound levels?? the game might be really quiet or really loud, on my end it was loud while testing it so i turned the sounds wayyyy down and even then it was still kinda loud so i suggest keeping the volume on your computer around like 30% and it should be fine

light blood/ gore

a little bit of unpleasent food imagery
